articles.author: Sam Brookes
articles.title: Rio Ferdinand hails Antonio Conte after Tottenham's battling draw at Chelsea - Daily Mail
articles.description: Spurs fell behind twice at Stamford Bridge, but battled back both times to claim a 2-2 draw, with Harry Kane scoring in the final minute to rescue a point in an absorbing contest.
articles.content:
Rio Ferdinand believes the mentality that Antonio Conte has instilled in his players helped Tottenham earn themselves a draw against Chelsea on Sunday.
